product_name: North Water FourPlay Multiple Use Paddle Float
long_description: The North Water FourPlay Multiple Use paddle float does quadruple duty as a beaching pad, sleeping pad, vehicle protection pad and, of course, a paddle float. Durable nylon stands up to the rigors of paddling, and closed cell foam offers superb flotation and comfortable padding. Foldable panels of closed-cell foam clamp around paddle blade and offer excellent flotation; quick-release buckles are easy to use even with cold hands. FourPlay unfolds to function as a pad to protect your vehicle from scratches when loading the boat, or a pad to protect your boat from scratches when coming to shore. Also can be used as a sleeping pad or configured into a comfy camp chair.
short_description: The North Water FourPlay Multiple Use paddle float does quadruple duty as a beaching pad, sleeping pad, vehicle protection pad and, of course, a paddle float.
